idea-plugin.name: Refactor4Green
idea-plugin.description: Plugin used to modify the source code of Android mobile applications in order for them to be more energy efficient. This changes are according to well-known energy patterns. THIS TEXT IS TO KNOW IF THIS IS THE NEW PLUGIN OR NOT.
